name: src/games/501.js
Darts501Game
description: Class representing a 501 Game

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the `Darts501Game` class.
examples:
// Creating the new instance
var game = new Darts501Game([new Player({name: 'Player 1'}), new Player({name: 'Player 2'})]);

name: doubleIn
description: Determines whether option `doubleIn` is set to `true` or `false`.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} If `true` it will affect game specific logic.

return.description: If `true` it will affect game specific logic.

name: doubleOut
description: Determines whether option `doubleOut` is set to `true` or `false`.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} If `true` it will affect game specific logic.

return.description: If `true` it will affect game specific logic.

name: throw
description: Represents single `throw`.

params.name: multiplier
params.description: Multiplier is between 1 and 3 for all of the numbers but 25 (which has only x2 multiplier).

name: getPointsByRound
description: Calculates points for specific round.

name: getPointsByPlayer
description: Calculates total points for specific player.

name: getCheckoutHint
description: Calculates step-by-step throws to check-out in the same round.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} Array of possible throws as string.

return.description: Array of possible throws as string.

name: src/games/dartsBaseGame.js
DartsBaseGame
description: Provides all the logic to create multiplier games based on this class

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the `DartsBaseGame` class.

name: throw
description: Represents single `throw`. Delegates its execution to the `currentRound` object.

params.name: multiplier
params.description: Multiplier is between 1 and 3 for all of the numbers but 25 (which has only x2 multiplier).

name: invalidateRound
description: Invalidates specific round.

name: invalidateThrow
description: Invalidates specific `throw`.

name: nextPlayer
description: Sets `currentPlayer` to the next one.

name: nextRound
description: Creates new instance of the `Round` for each player.

name: addPlayer
description: Adds a player to the game.

name: addPlayers
description: Add multiple players to the game.

name: src/index.js
src/player.js
Player
description: Provides all the logic to create instance of Player

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the `Player` class.

name: toString
description: Returns string representation of Player instance

name: src/round.js
Round
description: Class representing a round.

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the `Round` class.

name: throw
description: Represents single `throw`.

params.name: multiplier
params.description: Multiplier is between 1 and 3 for all of the numbers but 25 (which has only x2 multiplier).

name: pop
description: Removes last throw from the round.

name: clear
description: Clear all throws for the round.

name: invalidate
description: Invalidates whole round with specific `number` and `multiplier`.

params.name: multiplier
params.description: Multiplier is between 1 and 3 for all of the numbers but 25 (which has only x2 multiplier).

name: src/throw.js
Throw
description: Class representing a single `Throw`

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the `Throw` class.

params.name: multiplier
params.description: Multiplier is between 1 and 3 for all of the numbers but 25 (which has only x2 multiplier).

name: create
description: Factory function.

params.name: multiplier
params.description: Multiplier is between 1 and 3 for all of the numbers but 25 (which has only x2 multiplier).

name: fromString
description: Factory function.
examples:
let throwInstance1 = Throw.fromString('T20'); // triple 20
let throwInstance2 = Throw.fromString('S15'); // single 15
let throwInstance3 = Throw.fromString('DB'); // double Bull

name: number
description: Sets `number`.

name: multiplier
description: Sets `multiplier`.

name: multiplierAsString
description: Returns one of the followings: 'S' (single) or 'D' (double) or 'T' (triple)
